title: "Marker genes for clusters using *scde*"
bibliography:
  bibtex.bib
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
stopifnot(
  require(scde)
)
sce.norm <- readRDS("rds/sce.norm.tSNE.rds")
col.time <- brewer.pal(9, "Set3")[c(2,7:8)]
col.infection <- brewer.pal(12, "Paired")[c(9,2,4)]
col.status <- brewer.pal(12, "Paired")[c(9,1,7)]
names(col.time) <- levels(sce.norm$Time)[1:3]
names(col.infection) <- levels(sce.norm$Infection)
names(col.status) <- levels(sce.norm$Status)
outdir <- "07_markers_out"; dir.create(outdir, showWarnings = FALSE)
o.ifm.2h <- readRDS("rds/o.ifm_2h.rds")
o.ifm.4h <- readRDS("rds/o.ifm_4h.rds")
o.ifm.6h <- readRDS("rds/o.ifm_6h.rds")
scde.res <- readRDS("rds/scde_markers.rds")
goseq.res <- readRDS("rds/goseq_markers.rds")
```
